__Privilege:__ ['TEMPLATE_MANAGEMENT', 'AUTO_DEPLOY_MANAGEMENT']

This API migrates a server profile from one server to another. The system unassigns the identity from the server before the migration. If the migration to the selected server fails, the system displays a critical error. However, you can override the error and force the migration to another server. This API returns a job ID.

__Privilege:__ ['TEMPLATE_MANAGEMENT', 'AUTO_DEPLOY_MANAGEMENT']

__Privilege:__ ['TEMPLATE_MANAGEMENT', 'AUTO_DEPLOY_MANAGEMENT']

Renames a profile. It returns 0 on success; otherwise, it will fail throwing a proper error message.

__Privilege:__ ['TEMPLATE_MANAGEMENT', 'AUTO_DEPLOY_MANAGEMENT']

get.description:
Retrieves profile state information for all the profiles. Profile State indicates its functional state -- unassigned, assigned, or deployed.

__Privilege:__ VIEW

post.description:
Gets a list of device IDs which are already assigned to a profile, whose profile ID is different than the one passed in.

__Privilege:__ TEMPLATE_MANAGEMENT

Gets a list of device IDs which are assigned to a profile whose template ID is different than the one passed in.

__Privilege:__ TEMPLATE_MANAGEMENT

get.description:
Gets the profile usage for all the profiles. Profile Usage indicates what is using the profile -- nothing (unassigned), a device (only), a slot (only), a slot and the device in the slot, or assigned for auto-deploy.

__Privilege:__ VIEW

This is a root service. Gets all the endpoints for Troubleshoot service.

__Privilege:__ VIEW

Returns TechSupport Report (TSR) or diagnostic log files.

__Privilege:__ VIEW

post.description:
Gets the various service logs (TES, MS, EPS, Tomcat), zips them and returns the zip file.

__Privilege:__ VIEW

Deletes all available archived console logs on the appliance. This method ensures no archived logs are present on the file system.

__Privilege:__ DEVICE_CONFIGURATION

Returns the FSD (field service debug) status enabled via TUI.

__Privilege:__ APPLIANCE_SETUP

Disables FSD (Field Service Debug)

__Privilege:__ APPLIANCE_SETUP

Downloads the FSD (Field Service Debug) DAT file. This option is available when FSD is enabled via TUI.

__Privilege:__ APPLIANCE_SETUP

Uploads a signed FSD (Field Service Debug)  DAT file.

__Privilege:__ APPLIANCE_SETUP

Uploads an SSH public key file.

__Privilege:__ APPLIANCE_SETUP

Installs and grants signed FSD (Field Service Debug) files.

__Privilege:__ APPLIANCE_SETUP

get.description:
Collects and returns all the available protocols.

__Privilege:__ VIEW

Returns the details for the indicated protocol.

__Privilege:__ VIEW

Collects and returns all the available appliance connections.

__Privilege:__ VIEW

Returns the details for the indicated appliance connection.

__Privilege:__ VIEW

StartingMacAddress.description: The maximum length of a MAC address is 50 characters.

Content.description: Text content of the output file.

ViewTypeId.description: Template View ID. Types of template views are available under TemplateService/TemplateViewTypes.

TemplateId.description: Unique identifier for referencing a template.

Status.description: Status of Job excecution. True, if job executes successfully.

TaskId.description: Job Id of task for console update bundle download

NetworkBootToIso.description: (Optional) If network boot from ISO settings are wanted for the new profiles, they are specified in this element.

Name.description: Profile name - Cannot be null/empty, must be unique.

ProfileIds.description: IDs of the profiles to delete; only unassigned profiles will be deleted.

TaskId.description: Task id of the backup task.

BaseEntityId.description: This is the device or slot used to get the target inventory template.

DisplayName.description: ID of the attribute (e.g. Workload Profile)

IsIgnored.description: Is the attribute ignored during template deployment and compliance checks.

IsReadOnly.description: Determines if the attribute has been marked as read only in the attribute registry.

VersionMaximum.description: Maximum version which can be updated to latest available version.

Note.description: Notes to be taken care before upgrade.

DirectUpgradeSupported.description: Consoles can be updated directly to new version or need some dependency.

VersionMinimum.description: Minimum version which can be updated to latest available version.

BaseEntityId.description: A placeholder to hold the valid Target identifier which will be replaced with the device ID once the associated device with the target identifier gets discovered.

Identifier.description: Target identifier (service tag or node ID)

BaseEntityIds.description: Devices or slots used to get the target inventory template.

TemplateId.description: Template ID to derive virtual identities from.

ConsoleUpdateCriteria.description: Criteria to be fulfilled for updating a console.

ArchiveBasePath.description: Base path where update package is available.

Version.description: Version of the latest available console.

Description.description: Description of the changes included as part of update.

LastUpdateDateTime.description: Date and time of last console update job executed.

ArchiveDirectory.description: Base directory where update package is available.

ComponentName.description: Component name for which update is available.

Auto.description: Tells if console update job runs manually or automatically.

IsLocalBackup.description: Show only the backups from the same appliance

ViewTypeId.description: Type of view associated with template clone

NewTemplateName.description: Name of the proposed clone template.

Value.description: This will display each stage of restore.

Description.description: Identifies the template data and its structure as provided by this view.

Name.description: Name of the attribute view - Template Specific/System Specific

Content.description: Text content of the input file. The text is generally from an exported template file or an SCP file that is created from a device. The text must use the same structure as SCP files.

Type.description: Template type. For more information, see / TemplateService/TemplateTypes.

ViewTypeId.description: Template View ID. Types of template views are available under TemplateService/TemplateViewTypes.

File.description: Certificate file which needs to be uploaded

IsIgnored.description: Indicates whether or not attributes will be deployed (true = don't deploy, false = deploy)

ForceTasksTermination.description: This will gives us weather task terminated normally or not.

NetworkBootToIso.description: (Optional) If network boot from ISO settings are wanted for the new profiles, they are specified in this element.

ComplianceStatus.description: Compliance status. 1 Compliant. 2 Device Not Inventoried. 3 The expected value and current value do not match.

StrictCheck.description: When this is set to true, strict check is performed i.e. checking the VLAN w.r.t. name, network type and vlan range. If it is false then only vlan name and network type is used for matching.

PropagateVlan.description: When this is set to true, switches are allowed to propagate VLAN to other switches

BondingTechnology.description: Bonding technology used. Possible values are NoTeaming, LACP, Other

Name.description: Reserved - Assigned to a profile; deployment pending  | Assigned - Assigned to a profile and provisioned on device.

Status.description: True if upgrade attempted within 24 hours otherwise False

TaskId.description: ID of the latest console upgrade job

Component.description: Upgraded component which is OpenManage Enterprise

Id.description: ID of the attribute whose value needs to be modified.

IsIgnored.description: Indicates whether to ignore the attribute during template deployment and compliance checks.

TypeId.description: Template type. For more information, see / TemplateService/TemplateTypes.

SourceDeviceId.description: The identifier of the device—the reference device—from which a template is to be created.

Fqdds.description: iDRAC, BIOS, System, NIC, Lifecycle Controller, RAID, Event Filters, Fibre Channel.

ViewTypeId.description: Template View type. For more information, see / TemplateService/TemplateViewTypes.

BootToISOId.description: This is the ID of the object that contains network boot from ISO settings for the profile.

SourceTemplateId.description: ID of the template from which the profile was created.

LastUpdatedBy.description: Name of user that last updated the profile

CreatedBy.description: Name of user that created profile

LastUpdatedTime.description: Timestamp when profile was last updated

DisplayName.description: Name of the attribute group (e.g. BIOS)

TaskId.description: Backup taskId which needs to be aborted

ViewTypeId.description: View type. 0 None, 1 Compliance, 2 Deployment, 3 Inventory, 4 Sample

StorageAvailable.description: Pre-checking weather storage available for backup or not .

Status.description: Status weather it success or fail.

ComplianceStatus.description: Compliance status. 1 Compliant. 2 Device Not Inventoried. 3 The expected value and current value do not match.

Id.description: ID of the attribute option set

BaseEntityId.description: This is the device or slot used to get the target inventory template.

IqnPrefix.description: IQN prefix of iSCSI identity pool - The length of the IQN prefix is a maximum of 200 characters.

NetworkBootToIso.description: (Optional) If network boot from ISO settings are wanted for the new profiles, they are specified in this element.

DataSchemaId.description: ID of the data schema associated with the template.

TemplateName.description: Name of the template from which the profile was created.

ProfileModified.description: Indicates whether or not profile has been modified since it was last deployed.

GroupName.description: If targetTypeID is identifier (auto deploy), this is the name of the static group into which the device will be placed when it's discovered.

ChassisId.description: If targetTypeID is server or slot, this is the ID of the chassis associated with the target.

EditedBy.description: Name of the user who last edited the profile

ChassisName.description: If targetTypeID is server or slot, this is the name of the chassis associated with the target.

TemplateId.description: ID of the template from which the profile was created.

DeviceIdInSlot.description: ID of the device inserted to a chassis slot. This will be same as targetId for Device profiles

DeploymentTaskId.description: ID of the deployment task currently associated with the profile. It will be present only when the profile is deployed or scheduled for deployment.

LastRunStatus.description: Status of the current/last task associated with the profile.

TargetId.description: ID of the target where the profile is/will be deployed.

ProfileState.description: The current state of the profile (0-Unassigned/1-Assigned/4-Deployed).

BootToNetworkIsoId.description: This is the ID of the object that contains network boot from ISO settings for the profile.

CreatedBy.description: Name of the user who created the profile

TargetName.description: Name of the target where the profile is/will be deployed.

GroupId.description: If targetTypeID is identifier (auto deploy), this is the ID of the static group into which the device will be placed when it's discovered.

SourceEntityId.description: ID of the source device where the profile is currently deployed.

ForceMigrate.description: True indicates deploy to the destination device even if the profile cannot be removed from the source device.

Description.description: Identifies the template data and its structure as provided by this view.

Name.description: Name of the attribute view - Template Specific/System Specific

SelectAll.description: Indicates whether or not to delete the AutoDeploy targets that satisfy the filter parameters.

AutoDeployDeviceId.description: IDs of the target devices which will be deleted. This element is only used if selectAll is false.

Filters.description: Indicates the UI filters used to filter the records for deletion. This element is used only when selectAll is true.

AvailableSpace.description: Available space on the target appliance

IsRestoreReady.description: Status of Target appliance for restore.

TemplateId.description: ID of the template which will be used for deployment after the devices are discovered.

Identifiers.description: Identifier (service tag or node ID) of the devices to deploy to after they are discovered.

GroupId.description: Optional ID of the static group where the target devices will be placed once those devices are discovered.

IsReadOnly.description: Determines if the attribute has been marked as read only in the attribute registry.

DataType.description: The type of data that can be stored in the attribute based on the current configuration, attribute name, etc.

DeltaDeploy.description: True indicates deploy only attributes that have changed since the last deployment. False indicates deploy all profile attributes.

Name.description: Profile name - Cannot be null/empty, must be unique.

BaseEntityId.description: This is the device or slot used to get the target inventory template.

ComplianceStatus.description: Compliance status. 1 Compliant. 2 Device Not Inventoried. 3 The expected value and current value do not match.

IsReadOnly.description: Determines if the attribute has been marked as read only in the attribute registry.

IsIgnored.description: Is the attribute ignored during template deployment and compliance checks.

AttachAndApply.description: Decides whether to attach and apply profile to target

NetworkBootToIso.description: (Optional) If network boot from ISO settings are wanted for the new profiles, they are specified in this element.

Schedule.description: When to deploy profile - optional, default = runNow

DestinationPath.description: The location where the backup file will be stored

Password.description: The required user password to access the shared location.

UserId.description: The required user to access the shared location.

ForceMigrate.description: True indicates deploy to the destination device even if the profile cannot be removed from the source device.

DestinationDeviceEntityId.description: ID of the target device where the profile will be deployed.

SourceDeviceEntityId.description: ID of the source device where the profile is currently deployed. The profile will be removed from this device and then apply to the destination device.

Process.description: Process weather it is import or export

IsoTimeout.description: Timeout in hours to wait for network boot from ISO to complete.

BootToNetwork.description: Indicates whether or not network boot from ISO is wanted.

IsoPath.description: Network path to ISO to boot from.

SubnetMask.description: Subnet mask address of the iSCSI pool

IpRange.description: IP address range for the iSCSI initiator pool.

Gateway.description: Gateway address of the iSCSI pool.

ForceMigrate.description: If true, migration will be forced

Password.description: Password to access the network share.

IpAddress.description: IP address of the network share.

WorkGroup.description: Workgroup of the network share (if applicable).

User.description: Username to access the network share.

Description.description: Description of the Identity Pool - The maximum length of the description is 255 characters.

LastUpdatedBy.description: Name of the user who last updated the pool

CreatedBy.description: Name of the user who created the pool

Name.description: Name of the Identity Pool - It can have a maximum length of 255 characters.

IsoTimeout.description: Timeout in hours(default) to wait for network boot from ISO to complete.

BootToNetwork.description: Indicates whether or not network boot from ISO is wanted.

IsoPath.description: Network path to ISO to boot from.

BundleType.description: Type of the bundle to be downloaded.

EmailAddresses.description: Comma-separated list of email recipients for email notification

NotificationType.description: Specifies the type of notification whether on divergence or schedule basis

OutputFormat.description: Specifies the output format for email notification

IsRemoteAndLocalFileSame.description: Remote location file is same as downloaded file.

TaskId.description: Job Id of task for console update bundle download.

DownloadSize.description: Size of download bundle in KB.

TaskStatus.description: Status of the Job for console update bundle download.

StartingAddress.description: The length can be a maximum of 50 characters.

ComplianceBaselineId.description: Indicates the compliance baseline id to which the template has an association.                      This element is optional and it will be used when a devices compliant operation is requested.

ForceTasksTermination.description: Indicate that the tasks should be terminated

Passphrase.description: The encryption passphrase from which the key will be generated to encrypt the payload.

Id.description: ID of the Identity Pool that got created.

LastUpdatedTime.description: Timestamp indicating when this template was last modified.

IsBuiltIn.description: Indicates whether the template is a preinstalled template or customer-defined.

CreationTime.description: Timestamp indicating when this template was created.

HasIdentityAttributes.description: Determines if the template has identity attributes. That is any attribute that needs to be uniquely set from an identity pool before being deployed to a target device.

IdentityPoolId.description: The ID of the identify pool associated with the template. If an identity pool is not associated, this value is 0.

LastUpdatedBy.description: The name of the user who last modified this template.

SourceDeviceId.description: ID of the device from which the template is created

TaskId.description: ID of task that created the template

CreatedBy.description: The name of the user who created the template.

Identifier.description: When a device with this identifier (service tag/node ID) is discovered, deploy the profile to that device.

NetworkBootToIso.description: If network boot from ISO settings are wanted for the new profiles, they are specified in this element.

GroupId.description: After discovery, the device will be added to this static group.

IsoPath.description: Network path to ISO to boot from.

IsBootToNetworkIso.description: Indicates whether or not network boot from ISO is wanted.

TaskId.description: Job ID associated with the AutoDeploy job.

TemplateId.description: ID of the template which is being used for deployment

TaskLastRunStatusId.description: Status of the last AutoDeploy job

Identifier.description: Target identifier (service tag or node ID)
